pr_title: Members of roles with filters that don't match their attributes will …

timeline.bodyText:
Removed this ' | ' on purpose. Not related to my fix but there was a separator accidentally placed at the beginning of the name before the reminder icon (for pending members only).
Removed it so it will match the way role members look in the active members' list.
timeline.author: OferLevi85

timeline.message: Members of roles with filters that don't match their attributes will appear disabled
Members of roles with filters that don't match their attributes will appear disabled

timeline.bodyText: Note that rgb(53, 112, 244) that was added is equal to #3570f4 that was removed. The snapshot style didn't actually change...
timeline.author: OferLevi85

timeline.bodyText: can we move these to constants file ?
